content: the caprock canyon crochet lap blanket pattern is perfect for making a quick and gorgeous throw blanket you ll love using this lapghan makes a great gift or a lovely addition to your home décor this listing is for a downloadable pdf of a crochet pattern only you will not receive a physical product skill level easy finished size 32 x 44 hook size us size k/6 5 mm yarn samples used category 4 worsted weight yarn main stitches chain half_double_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch pattern uses us crochet terms and is available only in english please note that this pattern is available for free on stitching-together com the benefit of purchasing this pdf is an easy to read printable and ad-free version of the pattern https //www stitching-together com/crochet-lap-blanket/
